an4.41:1.1.en: “Mendicants, there are these four ways of developing immersion further.

an4.41:1.3.pli: Atthi, bhikkhave, samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāya saṁvattati;
an4.41:1.3.en: There is a way of developing immersion further that leads to blissful meditation in the present life.

an4.41:1.4.pli: atthi, bhikkhave, samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā ñāṇadassanappaṭilābhāya saṁvattati;
an4.41:1.4.en: There is a way of developing immersion further that leads to gaining knowledge and vision.

an4.41:1.5.pli: atthi, bhikkhave, samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satisampajaññāya saṁvattati;
an4.41:1.5.en: There is a way of developing immersion further that leads to mindfulness and awareness.

an4.41:1.6.pli: atthi, bhikkhave, samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā āsavānaṁ khayāya saṁvattati.
an4.41:1.6.en: There is a way of developing immersion further that leads to the ending of defilements.

an4.41:2.1.pli: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāya saṁvattati?
an4.41:2.1.en: And what is the way of developing immersion further that leads to blissful meditation in the present life?

an4.41:2.3.pli: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāya saṁvattati.
an4.41:2.3.en: This is the way of developing immersion further that leads to blissful meditation in the present life.

an4.41:3.1.pli: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā ñāṇadassanappaṭilābhāya saṁvattati?
an4.41:3.1.en: And what is the way of developing immersion further that leads to gaining knowledge and vision?

an4.41:3.5.pli: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā ñāṇadassanappaṭilābhāya saṁvattati.
an4.41:3.5.en: This is the way of developing immersion further that leads to gaining knowledge and vision.

an4.41:4.1.pli: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satisampajaññāya saṁvattati?
an4.41:4.1.en: And what is the way of developing immersion further that leads to mindfulness and awareness?

an4.41:4.4.pli: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satisampajaññāya saṁvattati.
an4.41:4.4.en: This is the way of developing immersion further that leads to mindfulness and awareness.

an4.41:5.1.pli: Katamā ca, bhikkhave, samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā āsavānaṁ khayāya saṁvattati?
an4.41:5.1.en: And what is the way of developing immersion further that leads to the ending of defilements?

an4.41:5.8.pli: Ayaṁ, bhikkhave, samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā āsavānaṁ khayāya saṁvattati.
an4.41:5.8.en: This is the way of developing immersion further that leads to the ending of defilements.

an4.41:5.9.en: These are the four ways of developing immersion further.

dn33:1.11.24.en: Four ways of developing immersion further.

dn33:1.11.25.pli: Atthāvuso, samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāya saṁvattati.
dn33:1.11.25.en: There is a way of developing immersion further that leads to blissful meditation in the present life.

dn33:1.11.26.pli: Atthāvuso, samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā ñāṇadassanapaṭilābhāya saṁvattati.
dn33:1.11.26.en: There is a way of developing immersion further that leads to gaining knowledge and vision.

dn33:1.11.27.pli: Atthāvuso samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satisampajaññāya saṁvattati.
dn33:1.11.27.en: There is a way of developing immersion further that leads to mindfulness and awareness.

dn33:1.11.28.pli: Atthāvuso samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā āsavānaṁ khayāya saṁvattati.
dn33:1.11.28.en: There is a way of developing immersion further that leads to the ending of defilements.

dn33:1.11.29.pli: Katamā cāvuso, samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāya saṁvattati?
dn33:1.11.29.en: And what is the way of developing immersion further that leads to blissful meditation in the present life?

dn33:1.11.33.pli: Ayaṁ, āvuso, samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāya saṁvattati. #5.1
dn33:1.11.33.en: This is the way of developing immersion further that leads to blissful meditation in the present life.

dn33:1.11.34.pli: Katamā cāvuso, samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā ñāṇadassanapaṭilābhāya saṁvattati?
dn33:1.11.34.en: And what is the way of developing immersion further that leads to gaining knowledge and vision?

dn33:1.11.37.pli: Ayaṁ, āvuso, samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā ñāṇadassanapaṭilābhāya saṁvattati. #5.2
dn33:1.11.37.en: This is the way of developing immersion further that leads to gaining knowledge and vision.

dn33:1.11.38.pli: Katamā cāvuso, samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satisampajaññāya saṁvattati?
dn33:1.11.38.en: And what is the way of developing immersion further that leads to mindfulness and awareness?

dn33:1.11.42.pli: Ayaṁ, āvuso, samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satisampajaññāya saṁvattati. #5.3
dn33:1.11.42.en: This is the way of developing immersion further that leads to mindfulness and awareness.

dn33:1.11.43.pli: Katamā cāvuso, samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā āsavānaṁ khayāya saṁvattati?
dn33:1.11.43.en: And what is the way of developing immersion further that leads to the ending of defilements?

dn33:1.11.50.pli: Ayaṁ, āvuso, samādhibhāvanā bhāvitā bahulīkatā āsavānaṁ khayāya saṁvattati. #5.4
dn33:1.11.50.en: This is the way of developing immersion further that leads to the ending of defilements.
